solution_line_template: Each gust blows the leaf forward {forward_per_gust} feet, so {num_gusts} gusts will blow it forward {forward_per_gust} * {num_gusts} = <<{forward_per_gust}*{num_gusts}={total_forward_distance}>>{total_forward_distance} feet.

Each swirl after a gust blows it back {backward_per_swirl} feet, so {num_gusts} swirls will blow it back {backward_per_swirl} * {num_gusts} = <<{num_gusts}*{backward_per_swirl}={total_backward_distance}>>{total_backward_distance} feet.

After {num_gusts} gusts, the leaf has traveled {total_forward_distance} - {total_backward_distance} = <<{total_forward_distance}-{total_backward_distance}={net_distance_traveled}>>{net_distance_traveled} feet down the sidewalk.
